answerText: Underworld[10] Underworld is by this postmodernist American author, who wrote about Hitler studies professor Jack Gladney's response to an "Airborne Toxic Event" in White Noise.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Schindler + Yale C + Minnesota B | 4 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The opening of this novel was originally published as "Pafko at the Wall". For 10 points each:  [10] Name this novel about waste manager Nick Shay who is deeply troubled by the affair of his wife Marian with his best friend Brian.
